dcterms:creator: R. Kumar
A. Ojha
S. Malmasi
M. Zampieri
dcterms:description: The TRAC-2 dataset consists of ~6k comments from YouTube labeled for aggression identification tasks, including Non-aggressive, Covertly Aggressive, and Overtly Aggressive categories, as well as gendered and non-gendered classifications.
dcterms:title: TRAC-2

dcterms:creator: R. Voigt
D. Jurgens
P. Vinodkumar
D. Jurafsky
Y. Tsvetkov
dcterms:description: The RtGender dataset contains social media posts from various platforms, annotated for the gender of the poster and respondents, as well as sentiment and relevance of responses.
dcterms:title: RtGender
